reviewText:
No matter what your age, marital status, or whether you work outside your home...Ms. Siress' information is for anyone who is trying to achieve balance in their life.

We are all under so much stress...both inner and outer situations may cause us to feel like our lives are out of our own control.  By watching these video tapes, you'll discover tools to:  find balance in your life, live by your own definition of success, understand where your feelings may come from, become a more effective person (not just efficient) and last but not least....PUT YOUR SELF CARE AT THE TOP OF YOUR LIST.
